languages.text: {n}Комиссар встречает ваш удар с прямой спиной и высоко поднятым подбородком, как и полагается настоящему дисциплинарному офицеру. Пусть это обман, и перед вами обычный мошенник — но этот мошенник наслаждается своей игрой и предпочитает умереть, не выйдя из роли.{/n}

{n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin just as a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium would. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар встречает ваш удар с прямой спиной и высоко поднятым подбородком, как и полагается настоящему дисциплинарному офицеру. Пусть это обман, и перед вами обычный мошенник — но этот мошенник наслаждается своей игрой и предпочитает умереть, не выйдя из роли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin worthy of a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

traits.speaker: Comissar

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin just as a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium would. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは背筋を伸ばし、帝国の本物の軍士官にふさわしく、顔を上げ、あなたの一撃を受け止める。詐欺師のごまかしに過ぎないかもしれないが、この詐欺師は自分のパフォーマンスを楽しみ、自分らしく死ぬことを選んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin just as a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium would. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは背筋を伸ばし、帝国の本物の軍士官にふさわしく、顔を上げ、あなたの一撃を受け止める。詐欺師のごまかしに過ぎないかもしれないが、この詐欺師は自分のパフォーマンスを楽しみ、自分らしく死ぬことを選んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}政委扬起了头，迎接你的攻击，就像帝国真正的政委那样。或许这只不过是这个骗子的骗术，但他确实很热爱他的表演，哪怕是临死前也不肯出戏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin just as a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium would. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委扬起了头，迎接你的攻击，就像帝国真正的政委一样。或许这只不过是这个骗子的骗术，但他确实很热爱他的表演，哪怕是临死前也不肯出戏。{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}El Comisario recibe tu golpe con la espalda erguida y la barbilla levantada, como lo habría hecho un auténtico oficial disciplinario del Imperium. Puede que no sea más que el engaño de un impostor, pero este impostor disfruta con su actuación y prefiere morir sin salirse de su personaje.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin just as a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium would. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario recibe tu golpe con la espalda erguida y la barbilla levantada, digno de un auténtico oficial disciplinario del Imperium. Puede que no sea más que el engaño de un impostor, pero este impostor disfruta con su actuación y prefiere morir sin salirse de su personaje.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar nimmt deinen Hieb mit geradem Rücken und erhobenem Kinn hin, wie es eines wahren Disziplinaroffiziers des Imperiums würdig ist. Es mag nur die Täuschung eines Betrügers sein, doch dieser Betrüger liebt sein Schauspiel und will sterben, ohne aus seiner Rolle zu fallen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin just as a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium would. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar nimmt deinen Hieb mit geradem Rücken und erhobenem Kinn hin, eines echten Disziplinaroffiziers des Imperiums würdig. Es mag nur die Täuschung eines Betrügers sein, doch dieser Betrüger liebt sein Schauspiel und will sterben, ohne aus seiner Rolle zu fallen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}Tel un véritable officier de l'Imperium, le commissaire garde le dos droit et le menton fièrement relevé au moment où vous abattez votre bras. Peut-être n'est-ce là qu'une manière de plus pour lui de tromper son monde, mais quoi qu'il en soit, il semble savourer sa propre prestation et meurt dans la peau de son personnage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin just as a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium would. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tel un véritable officier de l'Imperium, le commissaire garde le dos droit et le menton fièrement relevé au moment où vous abattez votre bras. Peut-être n'est-ce là qu'une manière de plus pour lui de tromper son monde, mais quoi qu'il en soit, il semble savourer sa propre prestation et meurt dans la peau de son personnage.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar

languages.text: {n}Komiser, vurduğun darbeyi; İmparatorluk'un tüm hakiki disiplin subayları gibi başı dimdik, alnı açık bir şekilde karşılıyor. Kendisi bir sahtekâr olsa bile yapmış olduğu şeyden zevk duyuyor ve kendinden ödün vermeden ölmeyi tercih ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar meets your blow with a straight back and a raised chin just as a real disciplinary officer of the Imperium would. It may be nothing more than a fraud's deception, but this fraud relishes his performance and prefers to die without breaking character.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İmparatorluk'un tüm hakiki disiplin subayları gibi, yediği darbenin karşısında Komiser'in de başı dimdik ve alnı açık. Sahtekârın tekinin üçkâğıtçılığından ibaret olsa bile, bu sahtekâr sergilediği performanstan gurur duymakla birlikte rolünden çıkmadan ölmeyi yeğliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Comissar
